body.name: SAMSUNG 27-Inch CR50 Frameless Curved Gaming Monitor (LC27R500FHNXZA) – 60Hz Refresh, Computer Monitor, 1920 x 1080p Resolution, 4ms Response, FreeSync, HDMI,Black

Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 2 mins
features: SEE DETAIL IN THE DARK: Every scene, incredibly defined; Samsung's innovative VA Panel technology delivers an outstanding 3000:1 contrast ratio with deep blacks and brilliant whites

ALL ACTION, NO DELAY: AMD Radeon FreeSync keeps your monitor and graphics card refresh rate in sync to reduced image tear and stutter; Watch movies and play games without any interruptions; Even fast action scenes look seamless and smooth
CAPTIVATING CURVES: Immerse yourself in work or play; The 1800R curved screen wraps around you, pulls you in, and keeps you focused, even during extended use

PROTECT YOUR EYES & DO MORE: Advanced eye comfort technology reduces eye strain for more comfortable extended computing; Flicker Free technology continuously removes tiring & irritating screen flicker, while Eye Saver Mode minimizes emitted blue light

STYLISH DESIGN: The 3-sided bezel-less display stretches from edge to edge for maximum viewing and a minimalist aesthetic; A refined dark blue gray exterior and Y-shaped stand base bring a sleek, modern look to your desk
body.description: 3-Sided Bezel-less display stretches from edge to edge for maximum viewing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent monitor - but took a little acclimation
reviews.reviewText: This monitor was an upgrade to a 24" flat panel I have been using for work for years, after having occasional difficulty focusing (progressive age-related far-sightedness). I had moved up to 2.0 readers and still sometimes found myself leaning in or squinting.I chose a curved monitor since the increased viewing angle out toward the edge of a wide flat screen can cause dimming. That was never a problem with the smaller monitor but I was concerned it might be with this one.It has taken me about a week to get used to the curved screen - it's a little weird if you have not used one before. However, I have grown to appreciate it - it reduces the change in viewing distance from middle to edge, which may reduce eyestrain since your eye is not having to refocus as much. The larger size has completely resolved the sharpness issue. I have been able to scale back to 1.75 readers and still have zero issues with reading text. I have even been able to reduce font size in some applications, yet still see more sharply than before.I cannot speak to its value as a gaming monitor but I suspect it would be wonderful. The view is more immersive than with a flat panel.With my work laptop I run it at 1920x1080 resolution, which is the best the laptop GPU will do.Assembly and connections were completely straightforward. The only caveat is that the screen is a bit heavy and the weight is centered somewhat forward of the hinge where the stand attaches to the back of the monitor. The screen seemed to want to "droop" forward after setting it up, but after moving the hinge through its full range a few times, it has been stable.The monitor comes with an HDMI cable which was too short to be of use in my installation (though the laptop sits right next to the monitor). However, I suspect most people (as I did) already have longer cables to hand that will work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: In my opinion, Samsung always delivers next level products and this was certainly no exception. This monitor is absolutely gorgeous! I was able to use it with a wireless display adapter and connect it with my phone (iPhone 13 Pro Max) very easily. This was what I bought the product for and it works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son. He loves it. The quality on it is amazing for his gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, great price $139
reviews.reviewText: Excellent monitor for my desk at work. Plenty of real estate to work on multiple apps / documents at once. Good picture quality. Tilt feature is nice. Base is constructed in a way that leaves desktop space under the monitor for other items like cell phone and office supplies. Highly recommended for this purpose.One thing I don't like is lack of easy buttons to brightness modes. My old monitor had an easy eco mode / normal / video / custom mode controlled by a simple button along the bottom edge. This monitor has a toggle joystick on the back that's harder to use and has only "normal" and "eye saver" modes on the front page of menu. The eye save mode is useless to me due to the awful color temperature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Monitor for Gaming : In depth description and overall opinion
reviews.reviewText: Positive: The monitor’s packaging has many protective features. The result was no dead, faded-colored, or dim pixels. The screen has a matte film over the screen, which significantly decreases eye strain due to prolonged uses. I have not slowly played back footage of the screen. This being said, I have not been able to observe any screen tearing. (Screen tearing is when a portion of the screen has not update in sync with the other portion. This results in the screen showing a different image for a split second.) With that being said, I believe the refresh rate is fast enough for this monitor.The 1080p resolution works well with this size monitor. (4K has much less of an effect on small screens.)The sleek stand has a relatively small footprint, yet is very sturdy. The bezel around the edges is very slim. Easy access for power cord and HDMI port. The digital menu can be easily navigated. The menu is operated through a joystick which is depressible. Overall clean design, easy menu flow, and quality image.Negative: I wish there was a quicker way to turn the monitor off. One must press the joy-stick down and scroll through a menu to the toggle off. There is not much more (for me) to comment on.(Personal opinion):The silver tone bezel adds a nice touch. As a gamer this has a fast enough refresh rate, and rgb range to handle any games/interfaces I have used.Conclusion:I would highly recommend this monitor. It works great for gaming as well as an everyday computer monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I don’t recommend this if you’re using a Mac and sitting up close, I had an issue with the letters looking very blocky (but that couldn’t been the Mac). But the monitor was sooo nice and looked fancy! I liked the curve a lot and I miss this monitor already. My partner accidentally broke it so I’m not using a larger 4K monitor from Samsung too, but it’s flat and you really notice the difference in comfort when editing and viewing it over a long period of time.
Like this product. It has only been in service for a couple of days and it took a bit of time to get used to the curve, but it is a really nice monitor!
Pues hasta ahora me a servido muy bien. Excelente calidad. A un buen precio. La caja solo llego un poco maltratada, pero todo muy bien empaquetado y nuevo. De hecho volveré a comprar otro je je je
Un super buen producto, la conecto con mi macbook y va genial!
